name: Hexed (itch) (Spicy Chicken)
description:
I've been hexed again. This time it won't be so easy to cure. I'm losing control over my body. My skin is turning green. I can't walk straight, I can't aim straight. I need to find the antidote.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Shoot

Hope you enjoy!

Made by Spicy Chicken for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
